title: Marketplace Roundtable #6: The Power Of Cash Flow With Darren McCammon
description: Investing is simple, but not easy. Darren McCammon, the author of Cash Flow Kingdom, discusses the hard work that goes into his investments, but also the way well-covered dividends help him sleep well at night when the market is selling off. He also shares a few long-term theses, including the marijuana sector and the natural gas/LNG trade play.
itunes:title: The Power Of Cash Flow With Darren McCammon
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: How a steady yield can help your work through a market downturn
